title: Motorola Moto G04 XT2421-2 (Dual Sim) Factory GSM Unlocked | 4+128GB | 6.56" 90Hz LCD Display | 16MP Camera | International Model - (Black)
description: The Motorola Moto G04 XT2421-2 is a versatile and budget-friendly smartphone that offers a great balance of performance and features. With its 6.56-inch 90Hz LCD display, you'll enjoy a smooth and immersive viewing experience, perfect for streaming videos, browsing the web, or playing games. Powered by a capable processor and 4GB of RAM, this dual SIM smartphone can handle multitasking with ease. The 128GB of internal storage (approximately 119GB available to user) provides ample space for your apps, photos, videos, and files, while the 16MP rear camera and 5MP front camera allow you to capture stunning memories. The international model is factory unlocked for GSM networks, giving you the freedom to choose your preferred carrier. With its sleek design and impressive specifications, the Motorola Moto G04 is an excellent choice for those seeking a reliable and affordable smartphone.
